name: Hotel 19-95
description:
Hotel 19-95, located off of I-85 Highway in Northern Washington. Explore such mysterious place, gather tools and food, read notes and find the secret door to all the answers.

ALSO: The idea of the game is about the experience, rather than interaction. Within different events, you will be able discover and given the path to your end. You will need to listen to your surroundings, read notes and follow your instinct.
